cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.1)

# Do NOT edit this file (unless you know CMake; but there's no reason to!!)

project (AwwGeezMan)

set ( sources
	AwwGeezMan.cpp )
	
set ( library_files
	Morty.cpp
	Morty.hpp)

add_library( MortyLibrary SHARED
            ${library_files} )

# Add the executable for the student's code to be tested in pytest framework
add_executable(AwwGeezMan ${sources})
target_link_libraries(AwwGeezMan MortyLibrary)
set_target_properties(AwwGeezMan PROPERTIES
    CXX_STANDARD 17
    CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON
    CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF
)
